page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: Education in Hoyland is Comprehensive in the main,it is formed like a pyramid with Kirk Balk High school at the pinnacle.In our area there are four Junior and Infant and one Junior feeder school.Greenfield and Springwood J.andI.School are relatively modern;King Street J.and I. School is due for closure in August 1985;Elsecar,C.ofE. J.and I. is built adjacent to the Church in{1852 with {money provided by the Earl of {Fitzwilliam;}Market Street Junior School is to become a J.andI. School in September 1985.The latter is fed by two Infant Schools, Blacker Hill and West Street.The latter of these is due to close also. In Hoyland there is a Roman Catholic J.andI. school. The children then go to Pope Pius Sec.in Wath. Schools in Jump and Hemingfield are linked to the Wombwell Pyramid.
